entities.name: wormtail
entities.description: Wormtail is a person who was not aware of the usefulness of Bertha Jorkins. He thought she might be useful but did not know how valuable her information would be.

entities.name: bertha jorkins
entities.description: Bertha Jorkins is a person whose information was invaluable to the second man. She provided crucial information that helped form their plan.

relationships.description: Wormtail's capture of Bertha Jorkins led to the second man gaining invaluable information that helped form their plan.
